spatial_accuracy.notes: Layout topology is mostly preserved, but the overall footprint of the utility room and its adjacent balcony is slightly altered. Wall geometry shows some misalignments, particularly the exterior wall of 'Deck 2' (top right). Window count is lower than the 2D plan, and their placement is generally non-existent in the render. Consistent scaling is applied but some proportions seem off. Deck to the left of Bed-2 is shown, but the one to the right of Bed-1 is almost fully enclosed with walls rather than being mostly open, creating a structural inaccuracy.

structural_fidelity.notes: Cutaway view is excellent, showing all interior walls. Architectural completeness is good, no major structural elements are missing. Hallucination control is strong, no invented rooms or features. UI cleanliness is violated due to the presence of 2D lines/text for the walls of the 'Deck 2' (top right corner). Presentation context is perfect with a dark isolated model.

furniture_mapping.notes: Most major furniture pieces are present and in the correct rooms. Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are generally present. However, the exact arrangement of some furniture, especially in the living/dining area and bedrooms, deviates from the 2D plan. The scale of some furniture items also appears slightly off. The utility room's contents are not fully represented.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Geometry style uses simplified forms and generally flat shaded surfaces with clean edges, but some slight gradient/texture is visible on the floors. Lighting is soft ambient with minimal shadows. Colors are distinguishable. Camera composition is an isometric projection, but the 45° rotation is not perfectly maintained, it appears slightly skewed. Model is centered and zoomed appropriately.

detected_errors.description: 2D lines and text present on the top right deck area in the 3D render, violating UI cleanliness.

summary: The 3D render provides a good representation of the 2D floor plan with significant structural and aesthetic fidelity, though minor issues with wall geometry, window omission, and UI cleanliness prevent a perfect score.
